definition.name: clj-kondo checks
definition.description: Lint your clojure code with clj-kondo in parallel to your builds
definition.author: DeLaGuardo

inputs.name: clj-kondo-args
inputs.description: Arguments to be passed to clj-kondo

inputs.name: check-name
inputs.description: Check name will be visible in Github Checks list

inputs.name: github_token
inputs.description: Github token to report linter results back to check
